docs.title: MRTrix3Tissue
docs.description: MRtrix3Tissue is a fork of MRtrix3 that adds capabilities for 3-Tissue Constrained Spherical Deconvolution (CSD) modelling and analysis. It provides Single-Shell 3-Tissue CSD (SS3T-CSD), enabling multi-tissue CSD analysis from single-shell diffusion MRI data without requiring multi-shell acquisitions.
affiliation: Florey Institute of Neuroscience and Mental Health
literature: Dhollander, T., Raffelt, D., & Connelly, A. (2016). A novel iterative approach to reap the benefits of multi-tissue CSD from just single-shell (+b=0) diffusion MRI data. Proceedings of the ISMRM, 24, 3010.
Dhollander, T., Mito, R., Raffelt, D., & Connelly, A. (2019). Improved white matter response function estimation for 3-tissue constrained spherical deconvolution. Proceedings of the ISMRM, 27, 555.
